r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is the GA release of the 2.2.3 SDK. It is a maitenance release with several fixes:
Changes: * PCBC-389: deserialize legacy docs as JSON with falling back to old behaviour * PCBC-428: use correct exception when credentials missing for CouchbaseClusterManager * Documentation updates and bug fixes
